Posts.Content: Had lumpectomy end of August, grade 3, 1 node micro met, wound infection, 14 weeks to heal, now been told first chemo 2 Jan.  Extremely scared of side effects seems like it will be 6 months of hell.  Cold cap or hair loss?
Posts.Title: starting treatment

Posts.Content: Thank you I suppose you get an idea after the first session, they tell you so much it is frightening,  Have to decide about scalp cooling but it felt freezing.  Good luck with your treatment.
Posts.Title: starting treatment
